description: This value set contract specific codes for security control.
name: ContractResourceSecurityControlCodes

text.div:
Each definition includes usage notes explaining the precedence order in contract lifecycle - i.e., while only some stages are required, the order in which they may occur is deterministic; and a map to comparable FHIR and v.3 status codes. It follows guidance about use of status codes in FHIR at http://build.fhir.org/sc.html.

Contract Resource Security Control codes

This value set contract specific codes for security control.

Copyright Statement:

HL7 International.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/contract-security-control defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
policy PolicyTo be completed

title: Contract Resource Security Control codes
